nodes.text: RX-7246 was a custom-made battle droid that was acquired by the Rodian gladiator Zayda for use as his personal combat assistant. In about 17 BBY, RX-7246 and Zayda participated in a gladiatorial fight in the palace of the Hutt crime lord Darga Jiramma Mionne on the planet Cato Neimoidia, fighting against the Gamorrean Karg brothers and a group of undercover Alderaanian Resistance agents.
